title: Violet
welcome: Welcome to Violet. You must download the database before using this app.
dbusermsg: Database pack containing user language and n/a. The storage requires %s of additional storage space. This database currently contains the latest data, but in order to keep the database up-to-date, you must follow the instructions to synchronize the data.
dballmsg: This is a database pack containing all languages. The storage requires %s of additional storage space. This database currently contains the latest data, but in order to keep the database up-to-date, you must follow the instructions to synchronize the data. Do not use this database unless it is a special case.
dbwarn: This database is very large and may contain unnecessary data for the user. The size of the database is directly proportional to the performance of data reads/writes, so this database can cause a very large performance hit. Would you like to download it anyway?
dbalready: Have you already downloaded the database?
dbalreadyerr:
Error! No file selected!
Please try again.
dbdcheckerr:
This is not a database file or the file is corrupted!
Please try again!
dbdretry:
An error has occurred!
Please check your internet connection and try again!
removetobookmark: has been removed from the bookmark.
infomessage: The developer does not collect any information from users. All images and details are provided by hitomi.la, e-hentai.org or exhentai.org.
tagmsgdefault: This setting is a search term setting.
tagrebuildmsg: Tag rebuilding is the process of resetting autocomplete tags according to the settings given above. To rebuild the database, see the database group below. Will you continue?
notice1: Thank you for downloading my app.
notice4: This app has nothing to do with
readrecorddesc: Viewed more than once articles are recorded.
cannotmodifydefaultgroup: The default group cannot be modified.
name: Name
deletegroupmsg: Deleted groups cannot be recovered. All bookmarks within the group are also deleted. Are you sure you want to delete this group?
deletebookmarkmsg: Do you want to delete all %s items? This action is irreversible.
thisislatestbookmark: Database is already up to date.
noauth: You do not have permission to run it.
recordmessage: There is a record that you have read up to %s page before. Do you want to continue reading?
violetservermsg: Would you like to enable the Violet Server function? This function is a service that collects user behavior information and displays statistical information in real time. We do not collect any information that could identify you.
dbrebuildmsg: Database rebuilding is a process of resetting the entire database according to user settings. When this function is performed, it is processed into a database optimized for the user setting environment, providing a very fast search and indexing environment. After executing this function, run the tag rebuild.
ensurecreatebookmark: Would you like to add $1 item to your bookmarks? (Groups are created for each Favorite.)
completeimportbookmark: All bookmark information has been loaded!
addtodownloadqueue: has been added to the download queue!
userappmsg: This user app id has a unique value on a per app session. Be sure to keep this user ID! If you lose your user ID, you may not be able to use important functions such as restoring bookmarks.
restorebookmarkmsg: Before restoring bookmarks, be sure to back up your existing bookmarks by exporting bookmarks! We are not responsible for any loss caused by user negligence.
remaintask: There are still files being downloaded. Please try again after completing download!
insertpinforregister: Insert four digits for set up PIN!
registerfinbeforeuseapplock: Please register your PIN before locking!
setlowerthanmaxitemposition: You must set lower than max item position!
showrecordjumpmessage: Show move to latest read page message
checkalreadydownloaded: This article have already been downloaded. Continue?
securemode: Hide app from the app list
cannotuseios: You cannot use update on iOS :(
